vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.49;
son of: Sheva (H7724);
brother of: Gibea (H1388)
§ Machbenah = "bond"
son of Sheva and grandson of Caleb
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
抹比拿 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "緊密結合"
示法之子, 迦勒之孫 (代上2:49)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
抹比拿 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "紧密结合"
示法之子, 迦勒之孙 (代上2:49)
